name: Ballamander
description:
In Ballamander, you and a friend become a pair of salamander athletes competing to win at Ballamander, the only salamander sport. Swing around the pond with your tongue, or use it to steal the ball from your opponent! 

Support: Two computer compatible controllers

Credits:

Lead Designer: Max Wolf

Lead Engineer: James Brandauer

User Research: Max Wolf, James Brandauer

Art: Max Wolf, Chloe Wohnoutka

Music: Claude Garrotte, Donovan Jaime Sierra
